RULE_ACT003.rule: Minimum vertical spacing of ACT is 62nm
RULE_ACT003.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('ACT_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('ACT_2')
space_cond = And(define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect))
drc_rule_constraints = Implies(space_cond, define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 62))

RULE_ACT005.rule: Horizontal spacing of ACT  must be 32nm, 96nm or >= 160nm
RULE_ACT005.script:
ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES = ACT ANGLE == 90 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0 < 0.032 OPPOSITE 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.032 < 0.096 OPPOSITE 
EXTERNAL ACT_VERTICAL_EDGES > 0.096 < 0.16 OPPOSITE
RULE_ACT005.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('ACT_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('ACT_2')
space_rule = Or(
    Or(obj1.llx - obj2.urx == 32, obj2.llx - obj1.urx == 32), 
    Or(obj1.llx - obj2.urx == 96, obj2.llx - obj1.urx == 96), 
    define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 160))
drc_rule_constraints = Implies(And(define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), space_rule)

RULE_ACT007A.rule: Minimum spacing of NW to ACT is 31nm
RULE_ACT007A.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('NW')
obj2 = RectangleClass('ACT')
space_rule_1 = Implies(And(define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 31))
space_rule_2 = Implies(And(define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 31))
drc_rule_constraints = And(space_rule_1, space_rule_2)

RULE_GATE002A.rule: Min horizontal pitch of GATE [A] is 128 nm
RULE_GATE002A.script:
x = INT GATEA_vertical_edges < 1 
y = DFM COPY x CENTERLINE 
y_copy = EXPAND EDGE y INSIDE BY 0.0001 
y_copy_vertical_edge =  y_copy ANGLE ==90 
EXT y_copy_vertical_edge < 0.127 OPPOSITE
RULE_GATE002A.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('GATEA_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('GATEA_2')
drc_rule_constraints = Implies(And(define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 128))

RULE_GATE002B.rule: Min horizontal pitch of GATE [B] is 128 nm
RULE_GATE002B.script:
x = INT GATEB_vertical_edges < 1 
y = DFM COPY x CENTERLINE 
y_copy = EXPAND EDGE y INSIDE BY 0.0001 
y_copy_vertical_edge =  y_copy ANGLE ==90 
EXT y_copy_vertical_edge < 0.127 OPPOSITE
RULE_GATE002B.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('GATEB_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('GATEB_2')
drc_rule_constraints = Implies(And(define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), obj1.center_x - obj2.center_x >= 128)

RULE_NIM005.rule: Minimum spacing of NIM to (ACT enclosed by PIM) is 0.030 um
RULE_NIM005.script:
ACT_ENCLOSED_PIM = ACT INSIDE PIM 
EXTERNAL NIM ACT_ENCLOSED_PIM < 0.03
RULE_NIM005.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('NIM')
obj2 = RectangleClass('ACT')
obj3 = RectangleClass('PIM')
enclosed = define_inside_rule(obj2.rect, obj3.rect)
space_rule_1 = Implies(And(enclosed, define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 30))
space_rule_2 = Implies(And(enclosed, define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 30))
drc_rule_constraints = And(space_rule_1, space_rule_2)

RULE_M1008A.rule: Minimum spacing of M1A when M1A is wider than 32nm and longer than 240nm is 68nm
RULE_M1008A.script:
M1A_wide = M1A WITH WIDTH > 0.032 
d = INT M1A_wide <= 1 OPPOSITE 
d_p = DFM PROPERTY M1A_wide d OVERLAP ABUT ALSO [EC1 = EC(d)] > 0.240 
EXT d_p M1A < 0.068
RULE_M1008A.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('M1A_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('M1A_2')
size_cond1 = And(obj1.width > 32, obj1.length > 240, obj2.width > 32, obj2.length > 240)
space_rule_1 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 68))
space_rule_2 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 68))
drc_rule_constraints = space_rule_1

d_p = DFM PROPERTY MG2_wide d OVERLAP ABUT ALSO [EC1 = EC(d)] > 2.400 
EXT d_p MG2 <= 0.320
RULE_MG2008.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('MG2_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('MG2_2')
size_cond1 = And(obj1.width > 320, obj1.length > 2400, obj2.width > 320, obj2.length > 2400)
space_rule_1 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 320))
space_rule_2 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 320))
drc_rule_constraints = And(space_rule_1, space_rule_2)

RULE_MG2009.rule: Minimum spacing of MG2 when MG2 is wider than 600nm and longer than 2400nm is 600nm
RULE_MG2009.script:
MG2_wide = MG2 WITH WIDTH > 0.600 
d = INT MG2_wide <= 1 OPPOSITE 
d_p = DFM PROPERTY MG2_wide d OVERLAP ABUT ALSO [EC1 = EC(d)] > 2.400 
EXT d_p MG2 <= 0.600
RULE_MG2009.constraints:
obj1 = RectangleClass('MG2_1')
obj2 = RectangleClass('MG2_2')
size_cond1 = And(obj1.width > 600, obj2.length > 2400, obj2.width > 600, obj2.length > 2400)
space_rule_1 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_vertical_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_horizontal_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 600))
space_rule_2 = Implies(And(size_cond1, define_horizontal_overlap_rule(obj1, obj2), define_outside_rule(obj1.rect, obj2.rect)), define_vertical_spacing_rule(obj1, obj2, 600))
drc_rule_constraints = And(space_rule_1, space_rule_2)
